document.masterDocTitle: Notes on the genus Anomala SAMOUELLE, 1819 (Coleoptera, Scarabaeidae, Rutelinae) in Vietnam and neighboring regions: eight new species and faunistic records

Remarks : Originally described from Assam and Myanmar (Pyin U Lwin),
Anomala variivestis
appears to be a widely distributed species in mainland Southeast Asia (see also PROKOFIEV 2015a ). Here, we report it from China and Thailand for the first time.
